parent_cmdline.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Command line of the parent process

parent_cmdline_length.description: Searchable. Character count of the parent process' command line

parent_cmdline_raw.description: Searchable. Command line related to parent process  Note: This field's value is untokenized.

parent_effective_reputation.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Effective reputation of the parent process; applied by the sensor when the event occurred

parent_effective_reputation_source.description: Searchable Source of the effective reputation for the parent process

parent_guid.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Unique process identifier assigned to the parent process

parent_hash.description: Searchable. MD5 and/or SHA-256 hash of the parent process binary

parent_name.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Filesystem path of the parent process binary

parent_pid.description: Searchable. Identifier assigned by the operating system to the parent process

parent_product_name.description: Product name associated with the parent executable (from the binary resource)

parent_publisher.description: Publisher name(s) on the certificate(s) used to sign the Windows or macOS binary of the parent process

parent_publisher_state.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. State of the digital signature(s) of the parent process' binary

parent_reputation.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Reputation of the parent process; applied when event is processed by the Carbon Black Cloud i.e. after sensor delivers event to the cloud

parent_user_id.description: Searchable. The user ID of the parent process.
